item.content:encoded: Me too, but yes of course you can do fine without them…

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: I bought mine, and I have never regretted it. It's definitely very worth it, at any level of the game.

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Lol 3 of my 8 ultimate pizzas gave app returns, I don't think I even needed to wait for the festival. PW Hard completed, just gotta get my lewts for wkai =D. Prince, how important are referal items? No one near me is interested in playing and I don't plan on buying them, which leaves looping… Do I need to loop for referal items before wkai or can I do fine without them?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Yea I been level grinding with Triple Triangle all week… I picked that over Timmy because higher crank = moe money, which I used to do a bit of PW upgrading… I've got my stats where they need to be now, but I really don't see why you think Extra Sausage is better. I've already got all my pizzas ready to go, it's just easier with my ghetto-rig team. Then ill have time to upgrade PW stuff for wkai

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Dammit kwigyo, stop trying to give youself a heart attack!! Just grind those levels like a goodboy and use extra sausage. PW Hard is the last thing before WorldKai, which if you try and do with crap stats I will smack you round the face. If you're at PW hard with crap stats that can't even pass a simple check like that even when waving about +19 str bonus, go home. -_-
Btw I mathed it and what you need is range okthnxbai.

(Wait, sausages are fatty too, I sense irony… double heart attack! One for each side)

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Yes I know Extra Sausage is a great dou team, but I can't handle the regular stat checks and I've calculated it so that I can pass the dou check on pizza. Yet again, right after posting I found the answer: there's a Regular section in the list of BN allies that can be used. For anyone in a similar boat with me, I figure that my 560 app x2 on festival day with a -10 app team gives me 8 ultimate pizzas… If I get lucky with a single return 9 ultimate pizzas and a team of stalker3 proof and the +dou str ally seems to be the best plan. Throw in a summon like Monkey Butler for an amazing 2 range 1 strength and you've got yourself a pretty nice chance of passing. For the people that have better stats than me, definately use Extra Sausage because my setup is a massive waste of app/pizza. Also… Don't forget to make a delicious pizza or two for the +6 all strength jutsu

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: im planning on doing this quest next festival day, so hopefully pizza will easily put me way past the dou stats i need…. so my question is that assuming my dou goes way over what's necesary, what team can i use to help out my other stats? would pinky3 stalker3 proof still work despite the fact that its a PW quest?
